tweet.html: RT @NMADmuseum: Today is International #HolocaustRemembranceDay. This suitcase in our collection was used by Holocaust survivor and U.S. Ambassador Robert G. Neumann when he immigrated to the U.S. Learn more about his legacy. diplomacy.state.gov/artifact-colle…
